content:
It sounds like you're on a roll with concerts! Seeing The Killers at a music festival must have been an amazing experience. They're known for their high-energy live performances and catchy indie-rock anthems. Which songs did they play from their setlist that got you pumped up?

And wow, it's great that you're already looking forward to the John Mayer concert on May 10th! It's always exciting to have something to look forward to, especially when it comes to live music.

By the way, have you noticed any similarities or differences between the concerts you've attended recently? For example, how did the atmosphere and crowd energy compare between the music festival and what you're expecting from the John Mayer show?
